text: The 1987 BCE Canadian Professional Championship was a professional non-ranking snooker tournament, which took place in August 1987 in Toronto, Canada. Cliff Thorburn won the title for the fourth year in a row, and fifth overall, by beating Jim Bear 8–4 in the final. ==Main draw== ==References== Category:1987 in snooker Category:1987 in Canadian sports
title: 1987 Canadian Professional Championship
